alert.note: Alert for Broward; Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 2:12PM EDT until April 04 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Broward County in southeastern Florida... South central Palm Beach County in southeastern Florida... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 211 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Loxahatchee NWR, or 17 miles northwest of Coral Springs, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Loxahatchee NWR. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
